author: Pure Storage Ansible Team (@sdodsley) <pure-ansible-team@purestorage.com>
notes: This module requires the C(purestorage) Python library
You must set C(PUREFA_URL) and C(PUREFA_API) environment variables if I(fa_url) and I(api_token) arguments are not passed to the module directly

description: FlashArray API token for admin privileged user.
Define whether to eradicate the file system on delete or leave in trash.
FlashArray management IPv4 address or Hostname.
Value to rename the specified file system to
Define whether the file system should exist or not.

purestorage.flasharray.purefa_fs.examples:
- name: Create file system foo
  purefa_fs:
    name: foo
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592

- name: Delete file system foo
  purefa_apiclient:
    name: ansible-token
    enabled: false
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592

- name: Enable API CLient
  purefa_apiclient:
    name: ansible-token
    enabled: true
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592

- name: Delete API Client
  purefa_apiclient:
    state: absent
    name: ansible-token
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
